title: amudanukku amudUTTum yamunai
sahitya:
amudanukku amudUTTum yamunai-ArE unpOlE tavam sheidAr yArE ArAvad-


anupallavi

  kumuda malaranna vizhiyAlum kuzhiyum kannap-punnakaiyAlum sukhamumAna 
iLa mozhiyAlum tONumuLLa mAnap-poeuL yAvaiyum vENugAnamOD-urugum ArAvad-


caraNam    ninaindAlum nenjattamUTTum engaL nIlavaNNak-kaNNa mannan tannai ninaindu 
ninaindamudu UTTudiyO munnekkAlum kaNdariyA tava nilai mOnamAna vAnavarkkumEdena 
munaindu munaindunI kATTudiyO tanakkenAda tanmaiyum tavamum piravi guNamO poduvO 
tAnuNNukAlai UruNNavaikkum tanmai enbArgaLaduvO anaittulagam mayanga vandoru kuzhal
ArumishaiyALanivanO aLLip-paruguvadEnO nIyO shollir shuvai tarum ArAvad-
